divs: Sighting DetailsHeading w. on either jack williams,bull creek,or whatever it is between hwy 36 and 107 heading into enola,ark.looked in rear view mirror,saw lights i hadn't noticed before,thought they were probablly farm lights in the distance,1 white light,one amber about 45 degrees above and to the side,didnt think much of it til I rounded a turn and changed directions that i saw the same thing again in mirror.I go the same route every tuesday evening ,never seen that,but i know they fly a lot of c-130s up in that area,kind of think thats probably what it was,who knows?
Summary: saw lights in rear view,thought farm,,turned corner,saw same lights in rear view mirror
trends: There have been no other sightings in Enola
This sighting has never been favorited.
